actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: Supporting the goals and ideals of National Salute to Hospitalized Veterans Week.
subjects: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

summary.text: Supports the goals and ideals of National Salute to Hospitalized Veterans Week and its efforts to pay tribute to veterans. Encourages Americans who live near a Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) hospital or similar facility to volunteer their time, visit, and thank such veterans for their service. Pledges to continue to support veterans-related services that provide quality, affordable health care to veterans in need, and pledges to take action to ensure that such veterans are given the best care a grateful nation can provide.

titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of National Salute to Hospitalized Veterans Week.
